useCase.name: User Login
useCase.description: Allows a user to log in to the application

preconditions.precondition: The user is on the login page

successEndConditions.condition: The user is redirected to the homepage

failureEndConditions.condition: The user is prompted to enter a correct identifier or password

mainSequence.step: If the identifier is correct, redirect the user to the homepage
If the identifier is incorrect, prompt the user to enter a correct identifier or password
If the user forgets the password, request a new password
